name: WeatherHunt
tagline: Project page for the WeatherHunt iOS app
body:
### WeatherHunt for iOS
WeatherHunt allows you to quickly see hundreds of weather forecasts at a glance so you can find the weather you're seeking.  Are you looking to go hiking this weekend but just want to stay dry?  WeatherHunt will show you where to go.    

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with WeatherHunt?  Have any feature requests?  Feel free to to contact us at support@weatherhunt.com and we'll help sort things out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
